SEMI HISTORICAL J1 TELESCOPE SIGHT
Tested on 1080p only

Sight is based off of night exercise images.

Vehicles found in this pack:

  • STB-2
  • Type 74 (C)
  • Type 74 (E)
  • Type 74 (F)
  • Type 74 (G)

SOURCE: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?pli=1&gid=1721666035#gid=1721666035

#sight #alltanks #anime #meme

#draken #j35 #j35a #j35d #j35xs #sweden #plane #collimator #sight #historical #userskin

Historical re-creation of J35 Draken collimator, as requested by a user. simply replaces the Sikte S6/S7 collimator with a more correct looking Beauduin T100 collimator.

Since this is not a collimator made by me and I consider it to be less accurate than my own work, I will not be including it in the Mega Pack.

INSTALL by unzipping included UserSkins folder to your War Thunder root directory and combine with any existing folder.
